title: Yasuo Counter (only works if using default skin
body:
https://imgur.com/nPshQyA
Step on his toesies 
Works every time
{{sticker:zombie-brand-clap}}

replies.body:
I own legos. It's why Yasuo goes 0/10 every game. 

{{champion:17}}
{{sticker:sg-janna}}
Which is worse, a lego or a d4 (4-sided die, is pretty much a caltrop)

In a total risk assessment?

The impact of a d4 is probably worse, by nature of its lower contact surface area and higher rigidity. But I keep track of my dice (mainly because they're not actually mine, but a friend's so I shouldn't lose them), so the likelihood of actually stepping on one is very low. Also, not many people own d4s or other dN (where N != 6). It's just a rare occurrence.

Legos, meanwhile, get everywhere. Have you ever been building something and just have it explode on you? The risk of legos is far worse than a d4.
This gave me a giggle.

yay a rioter comment
